channel.title: CVE Feed for Phi Phan -- Meta Field Block
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Phi Phan -- Meta Field Block

item.title: CVE-2024-43278|2024-09-13T13:58:53.331Z -- phi%20phan -- meta%20field%20block
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Phi Phan Meta Field Block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meta Field Block: from n/a through 1.2.13.
